statements: SELECT * FROM logistics_providers ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, address FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT contact_person, email FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_name = 'ABC Logistics';
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers WHERE address LIKE '%Lane%';
SELECT provider_id, email FROM logistics_providers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com%' AND provider_id > 5;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_name LIKE '%Logistics%';
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_name = 'ABC Logistics' ORDER BY provider_id DESC;
SELECT provider_name, contact_person, email FROM logistics_providers WHERE address LIKE '%Street%';
SELECT provider_id, email FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_name = 'XYZ Logistics';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000;
SELECT customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-12-31';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders ORDER BY total_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Delivered';
SELECT order_id, provider_id, shipment_date FROM shipments WHERE shipment_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01' AND total_amount > 1000 ORDER BY total_amount DESC
SELECT order_id, customer_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 100 ORDER BY order_date ASC
SELECT order_id, COUNT(shipment_id) AS num_shipments FROM orders LEFT JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id GROUP BY order_id HAVING num_shipments > 2

SELECT orders.order_id, orders.customer_id, shipments.provider_id, shipments.shipment_date FROM orders INNER JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id WHERE shipments.status = 'Delivered' LIMIT 5
SELECT MAX(total_amount) AS max_amount, MIN(total_amount) AS min_amount FROM orders
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_name, provider_contact FROM logistics_providers ORDER BY provider_name DESC;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders WHERE total_price > 100;
SELECT order_id, total_price, customer_id FROM orders WHERE order_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT shipment_id, shipping_date, expected_delivery_date FROM shipments WHERE shipping_date < expected_delivery_date ORDER BY expected_delivery_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT provider_id, provider_name FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_id = 1;
SELECT order_id, customer_id, order_date FROM orders ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT shipment_id, shipping_date, expected_delivery_date FROM shipments WHERE shipment_id BETWEEN 100 AND 200;
SELECT * FROM shipments JOIN orders ON shipments.order_id = orders.order_id;
SELECT * FROM orders;
SELECT order_id, total_amount, order_date FROM orders;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type, provider_id FROM logistics_providers;
SELECT shipment_id, ship_date, delivery_status FROM shipments;
SELECT tracking_id, location, update_time FROM tracking_details;
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE order_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE customer_id = 123 ORDER BY order_date DESC;
SELECT provider_name, provider_type FROM logistics_providers WHERE provider_type = 'Courier';
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE delivery_status = 'Delivered' ORDER BY ship_date ASC;

SELECT order_id, provider_name, location FROM orders JOIN shipments ON orders.order_id = shipments.order_id JOIN tracking_details ON shipments.shipment_id = tracking_details.shipment_id WHERE orders.total_amount > 100 ORDER BY orders.order_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM orders
SELECT order_id, total_amount FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 100
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT product_name, unit_price FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY unit_price DESC
SELECT order_id, shipment_date, status FROM shipments WHERE status='Shipped'
SELECT * FROM orders WHERE total_amount > 1000
SELECT customer_id, first_name, last_name FROM customers ORDER BY last_name ASC
SELECT * FROM products WHERE unit_price < 50 ORDER BY product_name DESC
SELECT p.product_name, o.total_amount FROM products p JOIN orders o ON p.product_id = o.order_id
SELECT * FROM shipments WHERE status = 'Shipped'
